items.sentence: The coach named Tom the captain of the team.
Tom was late for the meeting this afternoon.
Tom thought Mary\'s skirt was way too short.
Tom thought he\'d like to become a botanist.
Tom isn\'t very likely to be busy right now.
Tom just called to say he\'d accept the job.
Tom just can\'t seem to get along with Mary.
Wouldn\'t you like to see Tom\'s references?
All Tom really needed was about ten dollars.
Tom says that he\'s never tasted whale meat.
Tom does know what he\'s doing, doesn\'t he?
Tom isn\'t watching a basketball game on TV.
This restaurant has many vegetarian options.
Tom and Mary were disgusted with each other.
It\'s likely that Tom will do that tomorrow.
It\'s not likely that Tom did it on purpose.
My friends and I seldom talk about politics.
Tom told me that he isn\'t going to do that.
Why on earth didn\'t you take your medicine?
I\'ll buy you another one if you want me to.
